author: Sonam Saigal
title: Elgaar Parishad case: Varavara Rao, Shoma Sen refused bail
description: Two senior social activists P. Varavara Rao (80) and Shoma Sen (61), accused in the Elgaar Parishad case, were refused bail by a special court set up to try cases under the Unlawful Activities Prevent
content: Two senior social activists P. Varavara Rao (80) and Shoma Sen (61), accused in the Elgaar Parishad case, were refused bail by a special court set up to try cases under the Unlawful Activities Prevention Act (UAPA) on Tuesday. The two had sought interim bail … [+1669 chars]
